休.definition: to rest; to stop doing sth for a period of time; to cease; (imperative) don't

休倫湖.definition: Lake Huron, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]

休假.definition: to go on vacation; to have a holiday; to take leave

休兵.definition: to cease fire; armistice; rested troops

休學.definition: to suspend schooling; to defer study

休寧.definition: Xiuning, a county in Huangshan 黃山|黄山[Huang2shan1], Anhui

休寧縣.definition: Xiuning, a county in Huangshan 黃山|黄山[Huang2shan1], Anhui

休市.definition: to close the market (for a holiday or overnight etc)

休憩.definition: to rest; to relax; to take a break

休戚相關.definition: to share the same interests (idiom); to be closely related; to be in the same boat

休氏旋木雀.definition: (bird species of China) Hume's treecreeper (Certhia manipurensis)

休氏樹鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Hume's bush warbler (Horornis brunnescens)

休眠.definition: (biology) dormant; (of a volcano) dormant; (computing) to hibernate

休耕.definition: to leave farmland to lie fallow

休達.definition: Sebta or Ceuta (city in north Morocco)

休閒.definition: leisure; relaxation; not working; idle; to enjoy leisure; to lie fallow

休養.definition: to recuperate; to recover; to convalesce
